step.datasource: UPDATE [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[ReworkProcess] SET Status = 1, runid = '%runid%', sysmodified = GETDATE(), RetryCnt = RetryCnt+1 WHERE status < 2 and scrap = 0 and RetryCnt < 5

select top 100 percent r.ID as HeaderID --, 'N' as TransType ,'G' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'100' as TransactionType ,GETDATE() As 'Datum' ,i.GLAccountDistribution as Reknr ,'REWORK: '+ r.Ordernr As oms25 ,'600' As kstplcode ,i.Itemcode AS artcode
,r.[Serialnr] AS facode
,r.warehouse As warehouse ,'REWORK' As project ,ISNULL(r.[Quantity],1) as aantal ,cast(ISNULL(r.[Quantity],1) * i.CostPriceStandard as numeric (18,3)) as bdr_hfl ,GETDATE() As 'docdate' --proddatum As 'ReportDate' ,rtrim(ltrim(i.PackageDescription)) as UnitCode from [ProdGlobe_live].dbo.ReworkProcess r with (nolock) inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.[Items] i with (nolock) on i.itemcode = r.itemcode where r.status = 1 and r.runid = '%runid%' and r.scrap = 0 order by r.id

select top 100 percent r.ID as HeaderID --, 'N' as TransType ,'G' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'100' as TransactionType ,GETDATE() As 'Datum' ,i.GLAccountDistribution as Reknr ,'REWORK: '+ r.Ordernr As oms25 ,'600' As kstplcode ,i.Itemcode AS artcode
,r.[Serialnr] AS facode
,'95' As warehouse ,'REWORK' As project ,-ISNULL(r.[Quantity],1) as aantal ,-cast(ISNULL(r.[Quantity],1) * i.CostPriceStandard as numeric (18,3)) as bdr_hfl ,GETDATE() As 'docdate' --proddatum As 'ReportDate' ,rtrim(ltrim(i.PackageDescription)) as UnitCode from [ProdGlobe_live].dbo.ReworkProcess r with (nolock) inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.[Items] i with (nolock) on i.itemcode = r.itemcode where r.status = 1 and r.runid = '%runid%' and r.scrap = 0 order by r.id

select top 100 percent r.ID as HeaderID, 70 as dagbknr FROM [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[ReworkProcess] r with (nolock) inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.[Items] i with (nolock) on i.itemcode = r.itemcode where r.Status = 1 and r.runid = '%runid%' and r.scrap = 0 order by r.id

UPDATE [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[ReworkProcess] SET Status = 2, Sysmodified = GETDATE() FROM [ProdGlobe_live].[dbo].[ReworkProcess] r inner join [400]..items i with (NOLOCK) on r.itemcode = i.itemcode inner join [400]..gbkmut g with (NOLOCK) on g.TransSubType = 'G' and g.Regelcode = 'B' and g.TransactionType = '100' and g.datum = CONVERT(date,r.sysmodified) and g.Reknr = i.GLAccountDistribution and g.oms25 = 'REWORK: '+ r.Ordernr and g.kstplcode = '600' and g.artcode = r.Itemcode and ((r.serialnr is null and g.facode is null) or (g.facode = r.Serialnr)) and g.warehouse = r.warehouse and g.project = 'REWORK' and g.aantal = ISNULL(r.[Quantity],1)
WHERE r.status = 1 and r.runid = '%runid%' and r.scrap = 0 and g.id is not null
